name: Hoyolab Forum Dark Mode Theme
description:
Dark mode theme for miHoYo's Hoyolab forum (includes Genshin Impact, Honkai Impact 3rd and Tears of Themis); rest your eyes specially at night.

All forum sites should be included (the main homepage is not included only forum sites).
If you spot something that is missing just let me know in the comments here or in my original post on Hoyolab's forum about the dark mode theme.

https://www.hoyolab.com/article/85980

Have fun travelers o/
